field.email_format: [ES] This field has to be a valid email

label.motivation: [ES] Why do you want to sit?
label.sitters: [ES] Look for a perfect sitter for your pet

sitter.motivation: [ES] Why do you want to sit?

sitters.title: [ES] Find your pets' favourite sitter in just a view clicks
sitters.description: [ES] A community of pet sitters keeping pets happy while you cannot take care of them.

community.title: [ES] Our pet loving community
community.description: [ES] All pet sitters & owners gathered in one place to make pets happy and their owners satisfied

main_page.title: [ES] Pet sitting with love and experience
main_page.description: [ES] Book a free verified and reviewed pet sitter from our pet-loving community, or find a pet to sit

register.title: [ES] Register form
register.description: [ES] Please fill in required fields to create your account

email_verification.title: [ES] Email verification
email_verification.description: [ES] Congratulations! Your email has been verified. You will be redirected to login page in {{val}} seconds.

become_petsitter.title: [ES] Become a pet sitter
become_petsitter.description: [ES] You are just a few steps away from becoming a pet sitter. Please fill in all required fields to join PetPal community

experience.title: [ES] Pet sitting experience
experience.description: [ES] Describe your experience with animals, why do you want to be a pet sitter, and what animals would you like to sit

availability.title: [ES] Availability
availability.description: [ES] Please fill in your availability to help potential pet owners in making the right plans

summary.title: [ES] Pet sitter form summary
summary.description: [ES] Please check if everything is just like you want it to be

contact.title: [ES] Contact info
contact.description: [ES] Fill up your contact details to make it easier for a potencial sitter or pet owner to contact you. Only LOGGED user can view this data.

email_verification.success: [ES] Registration completed successfully! You can now login using provided credentials

access.not_logged_in: [ES] Access denied. Please log in to enter this page
access.logged_in: [ES] Access denied. You cannot enter this page while logged in

profile_pic.success: [ES] Profile picture has been updated successfully

login.success: [ES] You have been logged in successfully

create.fail: [ES] You cannot add review to this user

create.success: [ES] Sitter ad has been added successfully
create.fail: [ES] Something went wrong while adding a sitter ad, please check if you don't already own an advert
